name: MMAFights
0:
”Alexa, open MMA fights.”
”Alexa, open MMA fights and do Quick Review.”
”Alexa, open MMA fights and do Detailed Review.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: m. m. a. fights
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill provides information about upcoming fight cards of the most popular MMA (Mixed Martial Arts) promotion company. The invocation name is "mma fights". You can select quick review option by saying "Quick Review", and it will read all scheduled MMA fight cards. Also, you can select detailed review option by saying "Detailed Review", and it will read all scheduled MMA fight cards including all fighters on the main cards. All information is retrieved from Wikipedia.com by using official wiki-APIs.

Please see the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
